anyOf.description: Represents a count of something per time duration

amount.description:
amount
The amount of things. Leave 0 for infinite (meaning always spawn whenever)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

anyOf.description:
per
The time interval. Leave blank for infinite 0 (meaning always spawn all the time)
   
Duration (Object)
Represents a combined duration. Fill each property to add time into a single duration
    
You can instead specify "snippet/duration/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.
    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

per.description:
per
The time interval. Leave blank for infinite 0 (meaning always spawn all the time)
   
Duration (Object)
Represents a combined duration. Fill each property to add time into a single duration
    
You can instead specify "snippet/duration/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.
    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

description: Represents a count of something per time duration

anyOf.description: Represents a combined duration. Fill each property to add time into a single duration

milliseconds.description:
milliseconds
Milliseconds (1000ms = 1 second)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

minecraftTicks.description:
minecraftTicks
Minecraft Ticks (20 minecraft ticks = 1 second
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

seconds.description:
seconds
Seconds (60 seconds = 1 minute)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

minutes.description:
minutes
Minutes (60 minutes = 1 hour)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

minecraftHours.description:
minecraftHours
Minecraft Hours (about 50 real seconds)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

hours.description:
hours
Hours (24 hours = 1 day)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

minecraftDays.description:
minecraftDays
Minecraft Days (1 minecraft day = 20 real minutes)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

minecraftWeeks.description:
minecraftWeeks
Minecraft Weeks (1 minecraft week = 2 real hours and 18 real minutes)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

minecraftLunarCycles.description:
minecraftLunarCycles
Minecraft Lunar Cycles (1 minecraft lunar cycle = 2 real hours and 36 real minutes)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

days.description:
days
REAL (not minecraft) Days
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0
